message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SY, cs.AR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses the need for a next generation mobile communication system, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper analyzes the distributions of required instantaneous data rates for different traffic types, which involves information theory concepts. 
3. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper focuses on providing an immersive experience through ultra-high definition video and virtual reality, which falls under the scope of multimedia. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the overall data rate and bandwidth requirements to support multiple users with different traffic types, which involves systems and control concepts. 
5. cs.AR (Augmented Reality) - Although not the main focus, the paper briefly mentions virtual reality and immersive experience, which falls under the scope of augmented reality.
